Text:
If you are a seeder of the original torrent, please download and update using this torrent. Simply download and save the torrent to the location of the original torrent files. 

Your bit-torrent client will only need to verify than update missing files, which will include md5 checksum files and a newly added ReadMe.txt file. 

You do NOT need to re-download all 3.21gb, just a few kilobytes.
